message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $150!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $125. It's still a great value for you, considering its worth to you is $150!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $115. Can you do any better than that?

I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $128. It's still a good deal for you, and I'm getting close to my minimum price.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $122. Can you do any better than that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $130. It's a good deal for you, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'll make a final offer of $125. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll buy the product from you.
